Therefore , overall hypothesis study proposal chronic consumption cranberry improve endothelial function , prognostically validated surrogate cardiovascular risk . This study also aim reveal cranberry ( poly ) phenols bioactive property healthy men . Consequently , plasma urine metabolite peak correlate vascular outcome genome-wide expression microarrays perform reveal cell signal pathway associate cranberry ( poly ) phenol-mediated cardioprotective event .
